text: a roju kapata visvasulaina purusulu mariyu kapata visvasulaina strilu visvasulato ila antaru: "Miru ma koraku koncem veci undandi, memu mi velugu nundi koncem tisukuntamu." Varito ila anabadutundi: "Miru venukaku marali pondi, taruvata velugu koraku vedakandi!" Appudu vari madhya oka goda nilabettabadutundi. Daniki oka dvaramuntundi, dani lopali vaipu karunyamuntundi mariyu dani bayatavaipu siksa untundi
